charges.charge_disposition: The Court orders the defendant committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 10 months. Upon release, the defendant is placed on supervised release for a term of 1 year with special conditions. The Court furhter imposes restitution in the amount of $125,780.00 and a special assessment in the amount of $500
